tool_args.query: pipenv clean command IndexError get_requirement requirements.parse

query_preview: The pipenv clean command fails with an IndexError when trying to parse dependencies that result in an empty list. This happens because the get_requirement function in utils.py tries to access the first element of an empty list returned by requirements.parse(dep). /usr/local/Cellar/pipenv/11.7.1/libexec/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pipenv/utils.py utils.py get_requirement requirements.parse IndexError: list index out of range req = [r for r in requirements.parse(dep)][0]
